channel.title: [QUICKFIX] Just need a question answered
channel.description: What code do I have to delete to make the make-over mage stop coming up every time someone logs in, just the first time? Also, whenever I sign in, I always spawn in at the first spawn spot that I set up, in tut island. Not where I left off. If someone could just help me out a little. Thanks!

item.title: [QUICKFIX] Just need a question answered
item.dc:creator: @Felon Felon
item.description:
@Felon wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:9, topic:464561”][quote author=saminator7 link=topic=568603.msg4128345#msg4128345 date=1350759635]
Its cleaned delta. I know for a fact it came with the folder, i just must have accidently deleted it or something.
[/quote]
just make another folder, and name it ‘characters’ or whatever it was before then? lmao[/quote]
If the server isn’t a complete failure it usually makes a new one.

Read full topic

item.title: [QUICKFIX] Just need a question answered
item.dc:creator: @Felon Felon
item.description:
@Felon wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Check where the characters are saved. There might not be a folder where it’s trying to save it at. Look in PlayerSave.java.

If it’s saving items though. Then it’s just not saving your coordinates. And if you are on a 317. I believe your character files are in “317 Source”/data/characters

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

As Felon said, it sounds like the character files aren’t saving correctly.

item.title: [QUICKFIX] Just need a question answered
item.dc:creator: @Felon Felon
item.description:
@Felon wrote:

[quote=“saminator7, post:1, topic:464561”]What code do I have to delete to make the make-over mage stop coming up every time someone logs in, just the first time?
Also, whenever I sign in, I always spawn in at the first spawn spot that I set up, in tut island. Not where I left off.
If someone could just help me out a little.
Thanks![/quote]
No clue about the make-over mage. But the thing about new spawn spot. If you don’t have the same items as when you logged out. Then your character files aren’t saving.

Read full topic
